description:
Tackle your favourite hikes all winter. The lightweight, flexible deck moves naturally under your feet, and heel riser bars give your calves a break on steep sections. Sharp toe crampons and traction rails bite into crunchy snow and the Boa binding system wastes no time in the pursuit of fresh tracks in powder-filled forests.

  • FLEX Tail™ decking absorbs shock and allows a natural gait
  • CustomWrap™ 2.0 bindings use the tried and tested BOA® Fit System
  • Heel strap adjusts with a dial for comfort and a precise fit
  • ActiveLift™ Heel lifts for comfort and efficiency when going uphill
  • Toe crampons and 3D curved traction rails provide great control
name: Tubbs RDG Snowshoes - Unisex
